Articles.Content: I've re downloaded ksp and i want to re play the tutorials to get better and remember  how to play it . when i press the tutorial menu , NO TUTORIALS SHOW UP I've tried everything from verifying game files and deleting and re installing the game but nothing works. please someone help

My only suggestion is to check that the files are there, under the directory that has the KSP you are currently playing .  If the executable file KSP.exe is in, say, ../KSP then there should be a list of files in ../KSP/saves/training.  Recently, somebody accidentally deleted those files while cleaning up his old saves in ../KSP/saves/*.  I know you already re-installed, but maybe the re-install didn't work, or went to a different directory than where you start the game.

 If you tell us what operating system, Linux/Windows/MacOS, I think that will help get some good suggestions.
